item.title: Mandy add a quote by Adam Rex
item.description: "We could have made it to the Arizona border in a few more hours if we hadn't been distracting each other with stupid little arguments. Don't get me wrong; I liked J.Lo fine. I've made that bed. But I'm not sure there's a person in the world I could be with twenty-four hours a day for three weeks without getting a little snippy. If I ever meet such a person, I'm marrying them." -- Adam Rex

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Adam Rex
item.description: "Wherefor are you knowing it? If you stacked all of the Gorg in the galaxy on top of eachother, the Gorg would kill you." -- Adam Rex

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Dumas Malone
item.description: "The boldness of his mind was sheathed in a scabbard of politeness." -- Dumas Malone
